Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are rerouted via 63rd, State, 67th, King Drive, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, State, 67th, King Drive, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Roosevelt. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
